text.text: Kitty and I decided to catch a movie at Golden Village Yishun for a screening of Nei Zha 2. This theatre holds a special place in our hearts.  It was our go-to cinema back in our secondary school days, and it's still here, just as vibrant as we remember it. Stepping back into Golden Village Yishun was like stepping back in time, but with a modern twist. The theatre is even cleaner and more organized than we recall, and the seating is more comfortable.  Before the movie, we even treated ourselves to a relaxing half-hour massage on the massage chairs just outside our theatre.  The air conditioning was cool and refreshing, and the sound quality, as always, was excellent.  It was a delightful trip down memory lane, and we're glad we chose this theatre to enjoy our movie.

text.text: Medium sized theater, clean, service good, food and snacks average. Great place for residents living around the area to catch a movie. Avoid the crowd and the need to travel far to watch a movie in Orchard or somewhere further. However, if you are  looking for the high end amenities and experience then this is not the rigth cinema for you.

text.text: Ambience is ok. Aircon only turns on after 11am. Remains very cold after that. The handicapped lift to transport patrons who are wheelchair bound up the winding staircase was a disappointment, though the staff and manager are generally courteous and helpful.

originalText.text: Ambience is ok. Aircon only turns on after 11am. Remains very cold after that. The handicapped lift to transport patrons who are wheelchair bound up the winding staircase was a disappointment, though the staff and manager are generally courteous and helpful.

text.text: The place was great, had comfortable seats, delicious snacks, a lot of movie options but customer service was not greatâ€¦.The malay aunty at the register was so rude to me and my friends. She rolled her eyes at me when I was trying to take out my money and keyed in the wrong seatsâ€¦.I asked for back row but she gave us middle row. Also, when I told her what movie we wanted to watch, she keyed in a whole different movie instead??? (I repeated the name of the movie like more than 3 times) She got annoyed at me for doing so but I was just making sure she keyed in the correct movie for us. I honestly would come here again as this was just a one time experience with such horrible customer service. Other than that, good place for watching movie with your friends. ðŸ˜ŠðŸ˜Š
